definitions.definition: Any of multiple products that are produced at the same time, or by the same process
The colimit of two (or more) objects, without regard to any morphisms between them.
examples: The coproduct is a structure constructed from several similar structures, equipped with appropriate inclusion maps, which generalises the disjoint union of sets, of topological spaces and the free product of groups.

main_definition: Any of multiple products that are produced at the same time, or by the same process
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) The colimit of two (or more) objects, without regard to any morphisms between them.
